I have 2k 10 and i was wondering which one is better? 2K 10 is pretty good but i was wondering if live still has the nba 365 thing.

Live 10 this year, according to ppl on OperationSports, etc who have already gotten the game, gets simulation-level real stats right out of the box w/o slider tweaking...too bad there's no NTSC out for it yet :(

oh and nba live 365, yeah they expanded that for dynamic season mode (you play alongside the real season and download the real stats, tendencies, dna).  2k10 has a similar thing, called living rosters or something, but don't think 2k improved gameplay enough this year, and My Player mode is weak cause you can only sign one-year contracts o.0
